Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model

Class Flight

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Flight
public class Flight
extends java.lang.Object
Holds the Flight data in the FlightBookingSystem

    • Flight

      public Flight​(int id, java.lang.String flightNumber, java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String destination, java.time.LocalDate departureDate, int capacity, int basePrice)
      Parameters:
      id - The flights ID
      flightNumber - The flights Number
      origin - The Origin of the flight
      destination - The destination of the flight
      departureDate - The date of the departure
      capacity - The seating capacity
      basePrice - The base price of the seats
